about_the_game:
Choose any Balkan nation and earn your place in the sun. Manage your districts with what they produce. Maintain your people and your wealth. Plan assassinations and attacks to gain the upper hand for your conquest. Trade and participate in the Stock Market to manage your resources and plan ahead. Fight against your enemies for dominance to fully control the Balkan districts.
Key Features:
  • Detailed economy with 13 main goods with real time trading and stock market simulation.
  • Perform terrorist attacks, coups, assassinations, and invasions to grasp dominance in real time.
  • 17 countries to play as. There are other countries outside of the Balkans that can and will influence the conflict and trade.
  • Streamlined interface that is easy to grasp.
  • Increase your economic and military strength at the expense of rivals.
  • Intelligent AI that will trade, plan attacks, and protect itself for their own goals.

content_descriptors.notes: Actions nations can do include terrorism with terrorist attacks.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11 64 bit
  • Processor: i3-2130
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intergrated
  • Storage: 375 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Can run on lower hardware but not officially tested
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11 64 bit
  • Processor: Ryzen 3 4300G
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon Graphics

short_description: Become the next great dictator to forge a new Balkan Empire. Navigate the intense world of international trade and the stock market, use cunning espionage tactics to disrupt opponents, and overthrow and conquer your enemies. Strategy and secrecy are your keys to success in the Balkans.
